conclusion: Analyze given information using Newton's laws of motion.
Figure 2 shows a linear relationship between acceleration a and force F.
Slope of the line represents the effective mass of the system.
Equation of the line: a = (F - f_k) / m.
Line passes through points like (48 N, 6 m/sÂ²).
Reciprocal of slope gives total mass m = 8 kg.
No static frictional force; kinetic frictional force is proportional to normal force.
Combined mass of A and B is 8 kg.
Assume equal distribution: m_A = m_B = 4 kg.
Final answers: Coefficient of kinetic friction is 0, mass of A is 4 kg.
